description: Airbus Observer Seat Part Number Inspection
justification: Potential safety issue if seat is used without an update to the hinge bolt
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"

Gain access to third observer seat identification placard to read part and serial number. See attachment for location.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Make note of part number and serial number of seat

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

If seat's MFG part number is 16800-00-00, 16800-01-00 or 16800-01-01 and MFG serial number is less than 17T0001 skip to Step 5.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Update DR as follows "No further action required. Third Observer MFG part number is ______________ and serial number is ____________".

Restore simulator as necessary

Have DR routed to Engineering to close

Skip all remaining steps

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Only accomplish this step if the third observer seat you inspected meets the part and serial number requirements stated in Step 3.

Created an aircrew visible, MMI, DR stating the following "Third observer seat removed ref EA 2511-01617" 

 

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Remove third observer seat reference AMM 25-11-41.

Mark seat with simulator it was removed from and keep attachment hardware with seat 

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Move seat to computer room for Engineering disposition. 

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Update both DRs with work accomplished and have both routed to Engineering

Restore simulator as necessary

","notes":""}]
